00040 void shooSH_clean(void) {
00041         std::list<Job*>::iterator curr, end;
00042         for (curr =jobList.begin(), end = jobList.end(); curr != end; curr++) {
00043                 (*curr)->destroy();
00044                 delete *curr;
00045         }
00046         jobList.clear();
00047 }
00048 
00052 void shooSH_run (void) {
00053         Job* job;
00054         Parser p;
00055         Executor executor;
00056         bool exited = false;
00057         
00058         while (!exited) {
00059                 std::cout << "shooSH> ";
00060                 job = p.parseLine ();
00061                 history.push_back (job->getCommand());
00062                 if (job->hasFailed ()) {
00063                         std::cout << "Erro de sintaxe" << std::endl;
00064                 } else {
00065                         if (!(job->isNop()||job->hasExited())) {
00066                                 if (!job->hasPipe()) {
00067                                         if (executeBuiltin (job->getProcess(0)) == -1) {
00068                                                 job->setID (++currID);
00069                                                 jobList.push_back (job);
00070                                                 executor.execute (job);
00071                                         }
00072                                 } else {
00073                                         job->setID (++currID);
00074                                         jobList.push_back (job);
00075                                         executor.execute (job);
00076                                 }
00077                         } else {
00078                                 exited = job->hasExited();
00079                         }
00080                 }
00081                 job = NULL;
00082         }
00083         shooSH_clean();
00084 }
